main_definition: A day of the week, typically characterized as a day of rest or leisure in many cultures.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The seventh and last day of the week according to the Gregorian calendar.
meanings_and_examples.example: I usually sleep in on Sundays because it's my rest day.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An idiom representing something rare or unusual, originating from a biblical reference where Sunday was not considered workable by Jesus Christ for certain religious observances.
meanings_and_examples.example: Finding an honest person in today's world can be as rare as Sundays.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A slang term used to express excitement or enthusiasm, similar to saying 'great!'
meanings_and_examples.example: The team won the game! That's a Sunday!
